headline.main: LA Police: Sexuality Not Key Factor in Gay Son's Killing
headline.print_headline: LA Police: Sexuality Not Key Factor in Gay Son's Killing

docs.snippet: Police believe the primary reason a Los Angeles man shot and killed his adult son was to cover up for the stabbing death of his wife the previous day, and not chiefly because the son was gay, as prosecutors had alleged....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police believe the primary reason a Los Angeles man shot and killed his adult son was to cover up for the stabbing death of his wife the previous day, and not chiefly because the son was gay, as prosecutors had alleged.

headline.main: Mexico Names LA General Counsel as Ambassador to US
headline.print_headline: Mexico Names LA General Counsel as Ambassador to US

docs.snippet: Mexico nominated a new ambassador to the United States on Tuesday, a little over a half-year after his predecessor took up what many consider the country's most important overseas diplomatic post....

headline.main: Hawaii Lawmakers Push for Relief From Hot Classrooms
headline.print_headline: Hawaii Lawmakers Push for Relief From Hot Classrooms

docs.snippet: Most of Hawaii's public schools don't have air conditioning, and record-high temperatures have left teachers and students saying they can't focus because of the heat....

headline.main: Mexican Army Finds Opium Poppies Growing Near US Border
headline.print_headline: Mexican Army Finds Opium Poppies Growing Near US Border

headline.main: Amazon Chief Bezos Defends Corporate Culture in Letter to Shareholders

docs.snippet: RUBENS--Denise, (nee Blum), age 90, died April 4, 2016. Loving wife of the late Stanley Rubens, mother of Monique Rubens Krohn and the late Rick Rubens. In-law to Douglas Korhn, M.D. Loving and proud grandmother of Alex and Meaghan. Treasured sist...
docs.lead_paragraph:
RUBENS--Denise,

(nee Blum), age 90, died April 4, 2016. Loving wife of the late Stanley Rubens, mother of Monique Rubens Krohn and the late Rick Rubens. In-law to Douglas Korhn, M.D. Loving and proud grandmother of Alex and Meaghan. Treasured sister of Jacques Blum (deceased) and Rhoda Berman, and devoted aunt of Judy Siegel, Laurence Arnstein, Anne Blum and Laurie Arnould. Born in Paris, France, Denise fled her beloved city during WWII to come to the United States. She attended the Lycee Moliere, Dalton School and Hunter College, worked as a translator and resided in Hillsdale, NJ since 1955. Services at Gutterman and Musicant, 402 Park Street, Hackensack, NJ on Friday, April 8 at 11:30am. Donations may be made to Hearing Loss Association of America, 7910 Woodmont Avenue, Suite 1200, Bethesda, MD 20814.
